statement.p: A city's population in the year \displaystyle{x}=1970 was \displaystyle{y}=3,173,500. In 1985 the population was 3,181,000.
Compute the slope of the population growth (or decline) and choose the most accurate statement from the following:

ol.li: The population is decreasing at a rate of 550 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 550 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 500 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 700 people per year.
The population is decreasing at a rate of 700 people per year.
The population is decreasing at a rate of 500 people per year.

ul.li: C: The population is increasing at a rate of 500 people per year.
